name: Ninjask
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: Because it moves so quickly, it sometimes becomes unseeable. It congregates around tree sap.

abilities.name: Cast-off Shell
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may search your deck for Shedinja and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Night Slash
attacks.effect: You may switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
